text: The 2012 D.C. United is the seventeenth season for D.C. United playing in Major League Soccer. The team is playing in the Eastern Conference. == Games == === Major League Soccer === === U.S. Open Cup === === World Football Challenge === == Sources == Category:2012 in association football Category:Soccer in the United States Category:2012 in the United States Category:2010s in Washington, D.C.
